subject: Meeting Reminder
body: Just a reminder that we have a meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 10:00 AM. See you there!

subject: Project Update
body: Hey Peter, here's the latest update on our project progress. Let me know if you have any questions.

subject: Invitation to Dinner
body: Hi Lisa, I'm hosting a dinner party this Friday. I would love for you to join us. Please let me know if you can make it.
